alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Doddridge; Gilmer; Harrison; Jackson; Lewis; Mason; Ritchie; Roane; Wirt; Wood (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 02 at 2:06AM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM EST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Portions of southeast Ohio and West Virginia, including the following counties, in southeast Ohio, Meigs. In West Virginia, Calhoun, Doddridge, Gilmer, Harrison, Jackson, Lewis, Mason, Ritchie, Roane, Wirt and Wood. * WHEN...Until 600 AM EST. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 204 AM EST, county dispatch centers reported several back roads across the warned area were impacted by high water. Middle Island Creek near West Union is also cresting slightly above flood stage at this time. - Between 1.5 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Parkersburg, Clarksburg, Ripley, Spencer, Harrisville, Pomeroy, Elizabeth, Racine, Grantsville, Forked Run State Park, Ravenswood, Salem, New Haven, Pennsboro, Lumberport, West Union, North Bend State Park, Mineralwells, Sandyville and Jackson Mill. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Doddridge; Gilmer; Harrison; Jackson; Lewis; Mason; Ritchie; Roane; Wirt; Wood
